about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed?

about.name: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed?

hasPart.assesses: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed? | You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When leaving an interstate, you should maintain your speed until you enter the deceleration lane, at which point you should reduce your speed to the exit ramp's posted advisory speed.

suggestedAnswer.text: About halfway through the deceleration lane.

comment.text: About halfway through the deceleration lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: As you approach the deceleration lane.

comment.text: As you approach the deceleration lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Immediately upon entering the deceleration lane.

comment.text: Immediately upon entering the deceleration lane.

acceptedAnswer.text: Immediately upon entering the deceleration lane.

comment.text: Immediately upon entering the deceleration lane.

answerExplanation.text: When leaving an interstate, you should maintain your speed until you enter the deceleration lane, at which point you should reduce your speed to the exit ramp's posted advisory speed.

comment.text: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed? | When leaving an interstate, you should maintain your speed until you enter the deceleration lane, at which point you should reduce your speed to the exit ramp's posted advisory speed.

educationalAlignment.targetDescription: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
educationalAlignment.targetName: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed?

hasPart.name: It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day:

about.name: It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day:

hasPart.assesses: It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day: | It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is never a good idea to leave a child unattended in a car. It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle. A child may be left under the supervision of a person age 12 or older.

suggestedAnswer.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

comment.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

suggestedAnswer.text: If they are supervised by a person twelve years of age or older.

comment.text: If they are supervised by a person twelve years of age or older.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if the key is in the ignition.

comment.text: Only if the key is in the ignition.

acceptedAnswer.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

comment.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

answerExplanation.text: It is never a good idea to leave a child unattended in a car. It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle. A child may be left under the supervision of a person age 12 or older.

comment.text: It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle on a hot day: | It is never a good idea to leave a child unattended in a car. hasPart.name: All of the following are dangerous to do while driving. Which is also illegal?

about.name: All of the following are dangerous to do while driving. Which is also illegal?

hasPart.assesses: All of the following are dangerous to do while driving. Which is also illegal? | All of the following are dangerous to do while driving. Which is also illegal? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is illegal to drive while wearing a headset or earplugs in both ears.

suggestedAnswer.text: Wearing a headset that covers both ears.

comment.text: Wearing a headset that covers both ears.

suggestedAnswer.text: Having one or more interior lights on.

comment.text: Having one or more interior lights on.

suggestedAnswer.text: Using cruise control on residential streets.

comment.text: Using cruise control on residential streets.

acceptedAnswer.text: Wearing a headset that covers both ears.

comment.text: Wearing a headset that covers both ears.

answerExplanation.text: It is illegal to drive while wearing a headset or earplugs in both ears.

comment.text: All of the following are dangerous to do while driving. Which is also illegal? | It is illegal to drive while wearing a headset or earplugs in both ears.

hasPart.name: Blue traffic signs offer information on:

about.name: Blue traffic signs offer information on:

hasPart.assesses: Blue traffic signs offer information on: | Blue traffic signs offer information on: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Blue signs on the roadway are service signs. They are used to provide information about motorist services, such as upcoming rest areas, food options, or nearby hospitals.

comment.text: Motorist services.
Construction and maintenance.

suggestedAnswer.text: Mileage information, such as distances to specific locations.

comment.text: Mileage information, such as distances to specific locations.
Motorist services.

answerExplanation.text: Blue signs on the roadway are service signs. They are used to provide information about motorist services, such as upcoming rest areas, food options, or nearby hospitals.

hasPart.name: At an intersection with stop signs on all corners, yield the right-of-way to any driver:

about.name: At an intersection with stop signs on all corners, yield the right-of-way to any driver:

hasPart.assesses: At an intersection with stop signs on all corners, yield the right-of-way to any driver: | At an intersection with stop signs on all corners, yield the right-of-way to any driver: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: After coming to a full stop, vehicles should proceed through a four-way stop in the order in which they arrive to the intersection. If multiple vehicles arrive at the same time, the vehicle on the left must yield the right-of-way to the vehicle on the right.

comment.text: On your left.
Who arrived before you.
Across from your vehicle.
Who arrived before you.

answerExplanation.text: After coming to a full stop, vehicles should proceed through a four-way stop in the order in which they arrive to the intersection. If multiple vehicles arrive at the same time, the vehicle on the left must yield the right-of-way to the vehicle on the right.

comment.text: At an intersection with stop signs on all corners, yield the right-of-way to any driver: | After coming to a full stop, vehicles should proceed through a four-way stop in the order in which they arrive to the intersection. If multiple vehicles arrive at the same time, the vehicle on the left must yield the right-of-way to the vehicle on the right.

hasPart.name: On a green arrow, you must:

about.name: On a green arrow, you must:

hasPart.assesses: On a green arrow, you must: | On a green arrow, you must: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A green arrow means "go." You must turn in the direction the arrow is pointing after you yield to any vehicles, bicycles, or pedestrians who are still in the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Yield to any vehicle, bicycle, or pedestrian in the intersection.

comment.text: Yield to any vehicle, bicycle, or pedestrian in the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Yield to pedestrians only in the intersection.

comment.text: Yield to pedestrians only in the intersection.
Wait four seconds before proceeding.

acceptedAnswer.text: Yield to any vehicle, bicycle, or pedestrian in the intersection.

comment.text: Yield to any vehicle, bicycle, or pedestrian in the intersection.

answerExplanation.text: A green arrow means "go." You must turn in the direction the arrow is pointing after you yield to any vehicles, bicycles, or pedestrians who are still in the intersection.

comment.text: On a green arrow, you must: | A green arrow means "go." You must turn in the direction the arrow is pointing after you yield to any vehicles, bicycles, or pedestrians who are still in the intersection.
